label: Theory of Reinforced Concrete
description: Concrete materials; behavior of reinforced concrete construction; behavior and design of structural elements, one-way slabs, beams, and girders; columns; ACI code requirements; and introduction to continuity in reinforced concrete structures.  undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ARCH 352.
courseSectionInformation: undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ARCH 352.
classScheduleInformation: Students must register for one lab and one lecture section.
